content: मेदस् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [मेद्-असुन्] {@--1@} Fat, marrow one of the seven {%dhātus%} of the body and supposed to lie in the abdomen; <ls>Ms. 3. 182</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 44.</ls> {@--2@} Corpulence, fat of the body: मेदश्छदेकृशोदरं लघु भवत्युत्थानयोग्यं वपुः <ls>Ś. 2. 5.</ls> {@--3@} Excessive fatness, morbid corpulence.
